name: Fant Kids Matching Game
description: This is a game for people to improve their matching skills, and memory. Game includes the Fant Kids Eddie and Ellie. Scenes are selected in the room of the Fants. Joyful music and bright graphics are included.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Resolution adjustable for lower spec cards Storage: 372 MB available space Sound Card: sound supported
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 4 core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GFX Storage: 372 MB available space Sound Card: sound supported
